resources.string: No account yet? Sign up here.
Sign up as a customer to get started with Ayos!
SIGN UP here as an Ayos! worker

By clicking Sign Up, you agree to all the Terms and Conditions.
Already have an Account? Login here.
Input your email to make a new password.

\t\tAyos! was first created in November 2022 by a group of Benildean students—namely Deneb Ho, Samuel Noel, and Abigail Magpatoc,—Ayos! as their thesis project. Its mission is not just to be an app, but to be a handy and accessible tool para sa masa. \n\n\t\tThe app was initially introduced as a booking-app for Taft residents who were not familiar with their local community of repairmen, especially in the midst of the pandemic. However, Ayos! largened its scope to the whole Metro Manila area to further assist those who are in need—without worry and without ease! The Ayos! app services the following categories—Ayos Electrical, Ayos Plumbing, Ayos Appliance, and Ayos Aircon—to which registered Ayos! workers can accept the booking and provide their services at the provided time and date.

Our plumbing service provides a wide choice of solutions to your household issues such as clogged drains and toilets,leaky faucets and pipes, water heater issues, low water pressure, and a running toilet.
The air conditioning unit has to be cleaned every two months, did you know that? Make an appointment with Ayos\! for cleaning so that your air conditioner is properly maintained.
Ayos\! technicians are experts who are capable of installing and repairing home wiring. Book now for electrical wiring services at reasonable prices!
Have a broken washing machine? television? or rice cooker? We got you covered\! Our skilled appliance technicians will help you maintain and repair your appliances.
